title: 1.44 The House of Omri: Pinnacle of Power
itunes:title: The House of Omri: Pinnacle of Power
description: The House of Omri reigned for 140 years with four kings: Omri, Ahab, Ahaziah and Jehoram. They created the first sophisticated Hebrew state, and brought the kingdom of Israel to the height of its power and prosperity. During this period, the first great prophets, Elijah and Elisha, created the religion of Yahwism. We also meet Ahab's wife Jezebel, the painted lady. Assyria makes an unwelcome appearance.
content:encoded: The House of Omri reigned for 140 years with four kings: Omri, Ahab, Ahaziah and Jehoram. They created the first sophisticated Hebrew state, and brought the kingdom of Israel to the height of its power and prosperity. During this period, the first great prophets, Elijah and Elisha, created the religion of Yahwism. We also meet Ahab's wife Jezebel, the painted lady. Assyria makes an unwelcome appearance.
itunes:subtitle: Kings Omri, Ahab, Ahaziah and Jehoram create the first great Hebrew kingdom. The prophets Elijah and Elisha begin their work.
itunes:author: Garry Stevens
